scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc src/assembly/index.ts -b public/assembly/untouched.wasm -t public/assembly/untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug    --runtime full --importMemory --sharedMemory 65536 --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc src/assembly/index.ts -b public/assembly/optimized.wasm -t public/assembly/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --runtime full --importMemory --sharedMemory 65536 --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.vkbuild:untouched: asc src/assembly/pukan.ts -b public/assembly/pukan-unt.wasm -t public/assembly/pukan-unt.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug    --runtime full --importMemory --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.vkbuild:optimized: asc src/assembly/pukan.ts -b public/assembly/pukan-opt.wasm -t public/assembly/pukan-opt.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --runtime full --importMemory --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.vkbuild: npm run vkbuild:untouched && npm run vkbuild:optimized
scripts.start: npm i && npm run build && npm run dev
